title: Best of The Program | Guests: Edwin Black & Steve Deace | 5/26/21
description:
Pat Gray stops by to discuss John Cena’s pathetic apology to China for calling Taiwan a country. Historian Edwin Black teaches about the pro-Nazi sentiment that’s still in the Middle East today. BlazeTV host Steve Deace explains why he believes Dr. Fauci’s COVID flip-flopping and China are connected.


Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
